attributes.action: change the monarchy's male primogeniture to equal primogeniture
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This has been proven popular in other european kingdoms such as sweden, Belgium, Netherlands, Denmark and spain. This leaves us (the United Kingdom) and luxemburg the only nations not to have done this in europe, yet being the most powerfull kingdom in the world we should have done this first. This would be extreamly popular with women groups and be equal to sexuality in the UK, and would gain more popularity with British youth. It could take effect once charles takes over as king as a popular move like this would boost his sceptical popularity.
